meanings.definition: The scientific study of the oceans and their phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Oceanography helps us understand the oceans better.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in oceanography.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the oceanography class were quite studious.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for oceanography was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: Exploring oceanography opened up a whole new world of knowledge.

meanings.definition: The branch of science that deals with the physical and biological properties and phenomena of the sea.
meanings.sent1: Studying oceanography involves learning about marine life.
meanings.sent2: Oceanography combines biology and physics to study the sea.
meanings.sent3: The oceanography professor made waves with his research.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ocean of oceanography facts.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of oceanography lies in its vast mysteries.
